recipes.title: Spaghetti Carbonara
recipes.instructions: Cook spaghetti. Fry pancetta until crispy. Mix egg and parmesan. Toss with spaghetti and pancetta. Season with black pepper.

recipes.title: Chicken Tikka Masala
recipes.instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices. Grill until cooked. Simmer in tomato sauce and cream.

recipes.title: Tacos al Pastor
recipes.instructions: Marinate pork with pineapple and spices. Grill and slice. Serve on corn tortilla with pineapple, onion, and cilantro.

recipes.title: Sushi Rolls
recipes.instructions: Spread sushi rice on nori. Add fish, avocado, and cucumber. Roll tightly. Slice and serve with soy sauce and wasabi.

recipes.title: Chocolate Cake
recipes.instructions: Mix dry ingredients. Beat eggs and sugar. Add butter and cocoa. Bake until done. Frost if desired.

recipes.title: Caesar Salad
recipes.instructions: Toss lettuce with croutons, parmesan, and dressing. Garnish with anchovies. Serve chilled.

recipes.title: Beef Stroganoff
recipes.instructions: Sauté beef and onion. Add mushrooms. Stir in sour cream. Serve over cooked egg noodles.

recipes.title: Pad Thai
recipes.instructions: Soak noodles. Sauté shrimp and tofu. Add noodles and sauce. Toss with bean sprouts and peanuts.

recipes.title: Gazpacho
recipes.instructions: Blend tomatoes, cucumber, pepper, onion, and garlic. Chill. Serve cold with a drizzle of olive oil.

recipes.title: Moussaka
recipes.instructions: Layer eggplant with lamb, tomato sauce, and bechamel. Bake until golden. Sprinkle with cheese.
